quoteEN: You don't marry someone you can live with — you marry someone you cannot live without.
quoteES: No te casas con alguien con quien puedes vivir, te casas con alguien sin quien no puedes vivir.

quoteEN: I want all of you, forever, you and me, every day.
quoteES: Los quiero a todos, para siempre, usted y yo, todos los días.
author: ❤ Nicholas Sparks, -The Notebook- ❤

quoteEN: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day, so I never have to live without you.
quoteES: Si vives hasta los cien años, quiero vivir hasta los cien menos un día, así que nunca tendré que vivir sin ti.
author: ❤ Winnie the Pooh ❤

quoteEN: True love stories never have endings.
quoteES: Las verdaderas historias de amor nunca tienen final.
author: ❤ Richard Bach ❤

quoteEN: There's nothing that I wouldn't do to make you feel my love.
quoteES: No hay nada que no haría para hacerte sentir mi amor.
author: ❤ Bob Dylan ❤

quoteEN: 'Tis better to have loved and lost, than never to have loved at all.
quoteES: Es mejor haber amado y perdido que nunca haber amado en absoluto.
author: ❤ Alfred, Lord Tennyson ❤

quoteEN: Love is something sent from heaven to worry the hell out of you.
quoteES: El amor es algo enviado del cielo para preocuparte muchísimo.
author: ❤ Dolly Parton ❤

quoteEN: To be brave is to love someone unconditionally, without expecting anything in return.
quoteES: Ser valiente es amar a alguien incondicionalmente, sin esperar nada a cambio.
author: ❤ Madonna ❤

quoteEN: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because the reality is finally better than your dreams.
quoteES: Sabes que estás enamorado cuando no puedes dormirte porque la realidad es finalmente mejor que tus sueños.
author: ❤ Dr. Seuss ❤

quoteEN: I love being married. It's so great to find one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quoteES: Me encanta estar casado Es genial encontrar a una persona especial que quieras molestar por el resto de tu vida.
author: ❤ Rita Rudner ❤

quoteEN: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quoteES: Lo mejor para aferrarse en la vida es el uno al otro.
author: ❤ Audrey Hepburn ❤

quoteEN: You should be kissed and often, and by someone who knows how.
quoteES: Debes besarte y a menudo, y por alguien que sepa cómo.
author: ❤ Gone With the Wind ❤

quoteEN: That's why they call them crushes. If they were easy, they'd call them something else.
quoteES: Por eso los llaman enamoramientos. Si fueran fáciles, los llamarían de otra manera.
author: ❤ Sixteen Candles ❤

quoteEN: I like you very much. Just as you are.
quoteES: Me gustas mucho. Justo como tú eres.
author: ❤El diario de Bridget Jones❤

quoteEN: Personally, I love a great love story.
quoteES: Personalmente, amo una gran historia de amor.
author: ❤ Meghan Markle ❤
